actions.text: On agreeing to the Maloney, Carolyn B. amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A004) pursuant to the rule.
Amendment (A004) offered by Mrs. Maloney, Carolyn B.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Maloney, Carolyn B. amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Maloney, Carolyn B. amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mrs. Maloney, Carolyn B.

description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 117-381 to require agencies collecting information through a covered survey to establish data standards and protocols for anonymizing data collected and destroying personally-identifiable information at the appropriate time, which cannot be later than 3 years after the date that the information was collected.
